events.message: I recently purchased a jacket, but it doesn't fit and I would like to request a refund. Please let me know how to proceed.
The issue has been reviewed and categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message about returning a product.
This case has been assigned to agent Maria S. who specializes in refund processing to handle the customer's request efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I'm here to help you with the refund process and answer any questions you may have.
Could you please confirm the order number and whether you still have the original packaging? This will help us process your refund faster.
Thank you for your prompt response. My order number is #452789 and yes, I have kept the jacket in its original packaging as requested.
Great! Please ship the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly. Once we receive it, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thanks for explaining the process so clearly. I appreciate the quick support and will send the jacket back as soon as I receive the label.
The returned jacket has been received and inspected. Your refund has been successfully processed and should appear in your account shortly.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since your refund issue is resolved and you have no further questions, we are closing your support case. Thank you for choosing our service.
